summary.span: 一个描述概念模型中的基元类型的基类。

span.span: A base class that describes primitive types in a conceptual model.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关详细信息，请参阅 [ (EDM) 的简单类型 ](/previous-versions/bb399213(v=vs.90)) 和 [ (元数据) 的简单类型 ](/previous-versions/bb399796(v=vs.90))。For more information, see [Simple Types (EDM)](/previous-versions/bb399213(v=vs.90)) and [Simple Types (Metadata)](/previous-versions/bb399796(v=vs.90)).
